943270.name: XILOST
943270.description:
XILOST is a CO-OP first-person shooter game that focuses on cooperative gameplay. Players must work together to complete missions and take on intense firefights on various assignments.

Set into the future, technological advancements have bloomed exponentially, creating different tools and inventions marveled by humans.

In a secret institution, brilliant scientists and chemists are working on a controversial project: genetic alteration. Using a mysterious chemical, they can break down and rearrange DNA strains. However, Before they can fully research the chemical's effects, their work is interrupted when uninvited individuals enter the facility. Scientists and chemists have been missing since then, and the chemical's true potential remains a mystery.

XILOST is packed with satisfying gunplay and lets you play with your friends in a cooperative environment. You can play with up to 3 players in a single game. The game features a variety of missions, each with its unique objectives and challenges.

More content will come as the game progresses.

Intended game features:

  • 4-Player PVE Co-op

  • Campaign Mode (up to 4 player Coop Linear Story, with fixed levels, random objectives items)

  • Weapon Loadout

  • Weapon Progression

  • Character Customization

  • Character Progression

  • Game mode with randomly generated levels

  • Multiple Enemy Types

  • Multiple Weapons

  • Operation (Raid)

I hope this roadmap gives a good idea of what to expect from Xilost in the future,

and it's not set in stone, as we are 2 developers working on this project,

Community is also a huge part of the development process,

many things may change as the development progresses.
Our vision for Xilost is to provide strong gameplay as the fundamentals before we progress into the lore and universe of Xilost.

The game will be in Early Access until we ensure all core features and intended gameplay mechanics are implemented and polished.
